casebody.data:
Rulli, Appellee, v. Rulli et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Rulli v. Rulli (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 1223.]

(No. 97-565 Submitted December 2, 1997 Decided February 11, 1998.) Manchester, Bennett, Powers & Ullman, L.P.A., and John F. Zimmerman, Jr., for appellee. Henderson, Covington, Messenger, Newman & Thomas Co., L.P.A., James L. Messenger and Jerry M. Bryan, for appellants.

The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

*1224Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Cook, JJ., concur. Douglas, Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent.
